name: Deem LD48 Edition
description:
Play in fullscreen!

The first prototype of Deem, originally made for Ludum Dare 48, is now in active development!

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deem

Updates on @AdamPhoebe on Twitter.

First game ever made, thank you C2 for being so intuitive!

Streamers! You can now play Deem Multiplayer with chat! (Play after you've finished the main game!) https://alecsap.itch.io/deem-multiplayer If resolution is too low try reducing zoom size in browser and playing in fullscreen.

W-A-S-D or Arrow Keys to move

I to open the settings menu

Backspace to go back in the main menu or to skip the violin part

X to interact with trees or signs

Left Click to put a tile, Right Click to erase it.

1-3 number buttons to switch between objects.

5 number button to flip the object in your hand.

Music by Pix

(Most) Art by Me

Trees by Jestan

Keyboard Keys by Hyohnoo

Please report any bugs ASAP!
